title: Development of Parking - The Authority may develop any land, owned by or in possession of the Authority, for public parking in any of the forms - single or multi-storeyed, underground or above ground, irrespective of its existing use or proposed use in Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal
clause_text: Development of Parking - The Authority may develop any land, owned by or in possession of the Authority, for public parking in any of the forms - single or multi-storeyed, underground or above ground, irrespective of its existing use or proposed use in Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal.
section: 3.13 DEVELOPMENT OF CYCLE TRACK ALONG RIVER AND NALLAH

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
